neighborhoods.name: Pearl's Deluxe Burgers
neighborhoods.content: No-frills, counter-service joint serving burgers of all sorts, from buffalo to turkey to vegetarian.
neighborhoods.address: 708 Post St, San Francisco, CA 94109, United States

neighborhoods.name: Super Duper Burgers
neighborhoods.content: Counter-service chain outpost using local ingredients in its burgers, fries & organic milkshakes.
neighborhoods.address: 721 Market St, San Francisco, CA 94103, United States

neighborhoods.name: Four Barrel Coffee
neighborhoods.content: Exposed beams create a sleek & rustic ambiance for this Mission cafe specializing in drip coffee.
neighborhoods.address: 375 Valencia St, San Francisco, CA 94103, United States

neighborhoods.name: CoffeeShop
neighborhoods.content: Locally roasted organic coffees & other brewed drinks are served alongside baked goods at this shop.
neighborhoods.address: 3139 Mission St, San Francisco, CA 94110, United States

neighborhoods.name: The Black Horse London Pub
neighborhoods.content: British-inspired, cash-only pub serving beer & a limited bar food menu in a snug, welcoming space.
neighborhoods.address: 1514 Union St, San Francisco, CA 94123, United States

neighborhoods.name: Fireside Bar
neighborhoods.content: Relaxed bar pleasing locals & UCSF students with its cozy fireplace, overstuffed sofas & jukebox.
neighborhoods.address: 603 Irving St, San Francisco, CA 94122, United States
